#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked
void scanint(int &x);

int main()
{	
    	int testCase;
        scanint(testCase);
        for(int i=0;i<testCase;++i)
        {
            string temp;
            cin>>temp;
            int count=0;
            for(int j=0;j<temp.length();++j)
                count+=temp[j];
            printf("%c\n",count/temp.length());
        }
   	return 0;
}


void scanint(int &x)
{
        int flag=0;
        register int c = gc();
        if(c == '-') flag=1;
	x = 0;
	for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
	for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
        if(flag == 1)x=-x;
}
